about_the_game:
Staircase 55 is an atmospheric psychological horror game that thrusts you into the heart of your deepest fears. Equipped only with a high-powered flashlight, you're sent to uncover the mysteries at the bottom of an ominous stairwell, if there even is a bottom...

Adaptive Horror Experience
Tuned to engage your most intimate fears and anxieties, the game intricately analyses your playstyle, subtly adjusting the AI behavior to heighten tension and dread.

Procedural Generation
Designed not primarily for replayability but for unpredictability, Staircase 55 ensures each descent into the stairwell is a unique and unnerving journey.

The Staircase
Within this anomaly, ordinary rules of space and reason cease to apply. SCP-087, as classified by the SCP Foundation, is an enigmatic and paradoxical construct. Nestled within an abandoned building once owned by C.G.J., this peculiar stairwell defies comprehension. In an effort to maintain control, the Foundation has established a perimeter around the entrance, attempting to contain its unexplained and disturbing influence.

Join the exploration of Staircase 55, where every step you take further plunges you into the haunting unknown.

Brace yourself - it's a long way down.

content_descriptors.notes: Spoken dialog has some swearing and depictions of blood, violence and paranormal entities that might be disturbing to some audiences.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD 2.5 GHz or superior
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any DirectX 11 or 12 compatible card
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit (Version 20H2)
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 3700X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2080

short_description: An atmospheric psychological horror game that has you exploring a dark deep and paradoxical stairwell. Equipped only with a flashlight, navigate through the this strange staircase and uncover the secrets of the seemingly infinite stairwell, SCP-087.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Dutch, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Spanish - Latin America
*languages with full audio support
